post_loop_1.content: Hey, Frank, I think I’m stuck in a time loop…

post_loop_2.content: As an extremely intelligent budding scientist, I’d say the only way out of the time loop would be to put this can of body spray into the microwave

options: It'd be nicer if you weren't here.
Thanks, I'm glad you could come.

second2.text: Anyways, nice party you have here.
options: It'd be nicer if you weren't here.
Thanks, I'm glad you could come.

branch_1.text: I guess I’m glad too, despite the fact that we broke up two weeks ago. Doesn’t make this situation awkward at all…
options: Breaking up with you was the best decision I’ve ever made.
Sarcasm doesn’t really help make it any less awkward, Frank.

branch_2.text: Well, I guess it’s a good thing we broke up then. You don’t like my sarcasm, and I don’t like the fact that you never think of other people.
options: You really didn’t have to insult me at my birthday party. I’m done with you.
At least we can still be friends though, right?

branch_3.text: Yeah, we’re still friends. I think this was a healthy choice anyway. I’ve been able to think a lot more about pursuing my dreams.
options: Dreams? What dreams? The only dreams you had were the ones you saw when you were asleep.

branch_4.content: I want to be the next Thomas Franklin or Ben Edison! I’m going to make a name for myself!

branch_5.text: Do you think I should pursue my dreams even if it means I might get hurt along the way? No risk without some reward! Wait, did I say that wrong?
options: Follow your dreams if they’re important to you. No matter what.
You should follow your dreams, Frank, but don’t put yourself at any risk. Make safe choices.

final.content: I guess you’re right… I’ll be safe.
